Description: The technical specifications to refer when using the package. Easy-going, offline supported (via web PWA installation), and detailed oriented. Courtesy from ZORALab's Hestia.

Designs.Description: This component was designed by the following creators:
Designs.Title: Designers

Designs.Description:
This component has the following dependencies (arranged in the order from
left-top to right-bottom):
Designs.Title: Dependencies

Designs.Description:
For HTML, ZORALab's Hestia employs the W3C native syntax for simplicity and
maximum compatibility sakes. ZORALab's Hestia recommends the following HTML code
structure for this component.
Designs.Title: HTML

Designs.Code:
... ... ... ...
H1 H2 H3
...
...
Designs.Description: The minimum required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: Minimum HTML

Designs.Code:
... ... ... ...
H1 H2 H3
C1 ...
C2 ... ...
Designs.Description: The required HTML codes are shown below:
Designs.Title: 2-Axis Headers HTML

Designs.Description:
ZORALab's Hestia heavily rely on CSS to style this component and offering its
css variables for customizations. Below are the list of available CSS variables
at your disposal.
Designs.Title: CSS

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-display
CSS PROPERTY : display
DEFAULT      : block (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the display mode of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Display

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-overflow
CSS PROPERTY : overflow
DEFAULT      : auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the overflow behavior of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Overflow

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 2rem auto (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-min-width
CSS PROPERTY : min-width
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-max-width
CSS PROPERTY : max-width
DEFAULT      : 100% (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum width of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Width

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-min-height
CSS PROPERTY : min-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the minimum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Min-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-max-height
CSS PROPERTY : max-height
DEFAULT      : initial (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the maximum height of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Max-Height

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : 1px solid var(--table-color-primary) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Border

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-color
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-color-header
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-typography-100) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the header cell's color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Header)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-color-primary
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-300) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the primary color of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Color (Primary)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-color-print
CSS PROPERTY : color
DEFAULT      : var(--body-color-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the color of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Color (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-header-row
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-900) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the table first row header's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background (Row Header)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-header-column
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-700) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the table first column header's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background (Column Header)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-odd
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : transparent (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description:
Affects the odd number positioned data cell's background of the rendered
component.
Designs.Title: Background (Odd Elements)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-even
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-primary-50) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the even number positioned cell's background of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Background (Even Elements)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-focus
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--color-contrast-500) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the cell's background of the rendered component while being focused.
Designs.Title: Background (Focused)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-background-print
CSS PROPERTY : background
DEFAULT      : var(--body-background-print) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the background of the rendered component when in print mode.
Designs.Title: Background (Print Mode)

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-cell-margin
CSS PROPERTY : margin
DEFAULT      : 0 (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the table cell's margin of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Cell Margin

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-cell-padding
CSS PROPERTY : padding
DEFAULT      : 1rem (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the table cell's padding of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Cell Padding

Designs.Code:
VARIABLE     : --table-cell-border
CSS PROPERTY : border
DEFAULT      : var(--table-border) (>= v1.2.0)
Designs.Description: Affects the cell's border of the rendered component.
Designs.Title: Cell Border

Designs.Description: Fortunately, this component does not use any JavaScript. Relax.
Designs.Title: JavaScript

Functions.Description: Render the CSS output for this UI component.
Functions.Title: ToCSS

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package's primary purpose is to provide user interface (UI) styling
specifically for table values.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Main Purpose

ObjectiveAndPurposes.Description:
This package was known as 'table_hestiaUI' before
ZORALab's Hestia 'v1.2.0'. The transformation was due to someone attempting to
steal the design copyrights and makes way for programming package's
documentation restructuring.
ObjectiveAndPurposes.Title: Legacy Recording

Title: zoralabTABLE Technical Specification - ZORALab's Hestia
